choices: Shrunk as a bug, trying to get a human's attention
Live out the dangers of a forest
1.content: So how do you want to live out your insect life?
1.title: This is where it begins

info.description: You are an insect, and you can either try to get someone to turn you back to human or you can live in the forest with other insects. The only rule that I have is no toilet. Other than that, have fun!!! (P.S. the first 10 people to write on here gets 20 GP)
